author: nefario PhD

changelog.release_notes:
refactored most of the javascript (multiple js files)
added status bar (clock) for time series
added (very preliminary) round support
fixed appmessage bug (inbox size) for og pebbles

refactored more of all of the things
optimized memory use for list display
fixed crashing when returning to game list from game
fixed time closing app when returning to game list from game

fixed "loading..." issue (thanks to the community for bringing this to my attention)
upgraded to SDK 3
fixed timezone issue (thanks to the community for bringing this to my attention)

finally fixed jumbled text on notification (also fixed for current plays)
cleaned up some warnings

added hits|runs|errors for middle/end inning
fixed date rollover issue (game should stay after midnight)
added current half inning plays (press down)

fixed issue for no games on a day
fixed some minor logic issues that probably would never have affected anything
fixed score change highlight
changed outs to circles

fixed initial game load error when favorite team not playing
fixed auto-refresh not working properly (thanks Marc)
updated "diamond" graphics (probably still need to be bigger)
fixed "diamond" graphics to not display at middle/end of inning
fixed some sizing issues
skipped versions 0.08-0.09 because of octal interpretation (yay version 0.10)

fixed days with only a single game issue
changed to pebble's major.minor versioning convention

fixed initial refresh on delayed game
improved game list update
fixed previous/next day selection
added vibration alert for game start/restart and delay (activated with inning/3rd inning alert)
cleaned up some memory issues (but only because 2.1 made me)
added invert game display option
fixed some corner case refresh issues (returning to game from list)

added vibration alerts (score change, innings)
fixed refresh rate potentially resetting
fixed potential initial load issues
fixed extra refresh issue

team records on preview screen
reduced long press delay to cycle games
fixed list update when returning from game screen
fixed settings screen lag
fixed refresh failure issues
added pitch count (note: increased data usage)
fixed previous/next day

added better handling for delayed start status (sorry Cubs/Reds fans 4/28 & Mets/Phillies fans 4/29)
added better handling of generic statuses
more fixes to potential crashes
added loading message to list screen (mostly for initial load) so you'll know something is happening

description: Keep up with your favorite MLB teams right on your wrist. Follow live baseball games. Bug reports or ideas to make it better? Let me know in the forum: http://forums.getpebble.com/discussion/13038

latest_release.release_notes:
refactored most of the javascript (multiple js files)
added status bar (clock) for time series
added (very preliminary) round support
fixed appmessage bug (inbox size) for og pebbles

title: MLB ScoreWatch
